name: P0N+
description:
WARNING! This game contains flashing lights and other possible triggers for photosensitive epilepsy! Please do NOT play this game if you feel it may affect you! Thank you!

This game was developed for MiniLD #58. The theme was: Pong

-P0N+ is an impossibly hard arcade-style recreation of Pong. It contains 18 random events, each specifically made to make your time more challenging and to balance the more challenging events. Your only goal is to get the highest score you can and survive for as long as possible.

-P0N+ has a 4x3 (1280x960) resolution and scan lines for a more authentic Pong feel.

If you're interested in further updates and more games in the future, visit my Twitter page!
